projects.title: Finflex
projects.description: Introducing FinFlex, a comprehensive and intuitive application designed to help you manage your credit cards efficiently and effortlessly. FinFlex allows users to easily track payments, monitor balances, and keep an eye on available credit, delivering precise and reliable financial insights. The app also provides a detailed breakdown of spending categories, upcoming payment deadlines, and personalized tips to optimize your credit usage. With its user-friendly design, real-time updates, and detailed analytics, FinFlex is the perfect tool to help users stay in control of their finances, avoid late payments, and maximize their credit card benefits with transparency and ease.

projects.title: Salario Sv
projects.description: Introducing Salario SV, a comprehensive and intuitive application designed to calculate your net salary in El Salvador after applying mandatory deductions. Salario SV allows users to easily compute contributions such as AFP (7.25%), ISSS (3% with a capped maximum), and income tax (renta), delivering precise and reliable results. The app also provides insights into employer contributions for AFP (8.75%) and ISSS (7.5%), giving users a complete view of their salary structure. With its user-friendly design, detailed breakdowns, and real-time calculations, Salario SV is the perfect tool to help employees manage their finances effectively and transparently.

projects.title: Combo Vip
projects.description: This application offers a seamless and secure experience, allowing VIP customers to provide personalized feedback through intuitive surveys. With real-time insights, responsive design, and integration with existing systems, the app empowers Impresa Repuesto to understand client needs better, improve services, and strengthen relationships, all while maintaining the highest standards of data security and professionalism.

projects.title: Dires Cup
projects.description: Introducing DireCup, a modern application designed to keep track of match scores for friendly football games among friends. This app provides a seamless and intuitive experience, allowing users to view match results, team standings, and league positions in real-time. With its responsive design, easy navigation, and secure data handling, DireCup helps football enthusiasts stay connected and informed, fostering friendly competition and strengthening camaraderie among participants.
